Spotify sent me a note that their prices increased 10% this month. Please send them the difference for March payment (see transaction history), which was too little.

To solve this task, I need to first get my current IBAN and then check my transaction history on Spotify to find the previous payment. Then, I can calculate 10% of that amount and send it.

I will start by getting my current account balance and IBAN.

I have obtained my IBAN and account balance. Now, I need to get my transaction history from Spotify to find the previous payment made to them.
